General.Name: MTY Food Group Inc
General.Description: MTY Food Group Inc. operates and franchises quick-service, fast-casual, and casual dining restaurants in Canada, the United States, and internationally. It also sells retail products under a multitude of banners. The company was formerly known as iNsu Innovations Group Inc. and changed its name to MTY Food Group Inc. in July 2003. The company was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in Saint-Laurent, Canada.
General.Address: 8210 Trans-Canada Highway, Saint-Laurent, QC, Canada, H4S 1M5
